official_title: A bill to prohibit the payment of Federal Education assistance in States which require the licensing or certification of private schools or private school teachers.

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to prohibit the payment of Federal education assistance in States which require the licensing or certification of private schools or private school teachers.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the payment of Federal Education assistance in States which require the licensing or certification of private schools or private school teachers.
